he following variable, YTHACT2, was created by counting the number of positive responses reported over the following four youth activity
questions: School-based (YESCHACT), community-based (YECOMACT), church or faith-based (YEFAIACT), or other activities (YEOTHACT).
Youth respondents who reported participation in two or more activities were included in the "Two or more activities" category regardless of how
many other activity questions were answered. Youth respondents who did not answer two or more of the four youth activity questions with a "yes"
or "no" response were coded as system missing. To be included in the "None or one activity" category, a youth respondent must have answered two

column1: <s>or more of the activity questions and reported they participated in either zero or one activity.</s>
